General.Name: Acrobiosystems Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Acrobiosystems Co.,Ltd. engages in the development and manufacture of recombinant proteins, antibodies, and other biological reagents for pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies, and scientific research institutions. The company has a collaboration with Diagnostic Biochips Inc for neurological drug discovery and commercialization. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Mr. Tao  Lin
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO & Sec. of the Board of Directors
